title: Resolution Issues
body: When I start a game and load into loading screen my monitor says that my resolution is out of range. I checked the config file and verified that my resolution is set to the one that my monitor recommends. I also tried lowering the resolution to something lower and that did not work. I am using two monitors, if I load league on the second monitor and then switch it back to my main monitor it will work. Any ideas what could be the issue? I already uninstalled league and reinstalled.

replies.body: There was an issue a little bit ago where some players had resolution issues with that error, and we had them press Alt+Enter to resolve it as a temporary workaround.  This should now be resolved, so hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate your issue individually and find what's happening.  We'll reply back as soon as possible.
